mapper.select: select id, user_id, leave_start_time, leave_end_time, leave_reason, apply_time, leave_tp, status_cd, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user, is_delete from personnel_manage.employee_leave_apply where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into personnel_manage.employee_leave_apply(user_id, leave_start_time, leave_end_time, leave_reason, apply_time, leave_tp, status_cd, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user, is_delete) values (#{userId}, #{leaveStartTime}, #{leaveEndTime}, #{leaveReason}, #{applyTime}, #{leaveTp}, #{statusCd}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{modifyTime}, #{modifyUser}, #{isDelete})
mapper.update:
update personnel_manage.employee_leave_apply
user_id = #{userId},
leave_start_time = #{leaveStartTime},
leave_end_time = #{leaveEndTime},
leave_reason = #{leaveReason},
apply_time = #{applyTime},
leave_tp = #{leaveTp},
status_cd = #{statusCd},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
modify_user = #{modifyUser},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
where id = #{id}
